alert.note: Alert for Craig; Delaware; Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 2:14AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Craig, northern Delaware and Ottawa Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 214 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Commerce to 5 miles west of Cleora. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Miami... Baxter Springs... Grove... Commerce... Fairland... Afton... Quapaw... Bernice... Ketchum... Wyandotte... Treece... Picher... Honey Creek State Park... Bernice State Park... Cleora... Narcissa... Ottawa... Dodge... Cayuga... Peoria... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 289 and 324. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
